Package de.engehausen.treemap.examples.swing

Examples on how to use the tree map for Swing.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
FileViewer Sample application using a tree map to show file sizes starting at a given directory.
FilterDialog Color dialog used in FileViewer which allows to map colors to file names and directory names based on regular expressions (see Pattern).
Simple Very simple demo of the treemap widget.
SimpleBorder A very simple example of a tree map layout using the BorderRenderer.
SimpleCushion A very simple example of a tree map layout using the CushionRectangleRenderer.
 

Package de.engehausen.treemap.examples.swing Description

Examples on how to use the tree map for Swing. This package contains three very basic examples:

  • Simple
  • SimpleBorder
  • SimpleCushion
In addition a more complex "file viewer" example is provided; you may be reminded of Sequioa View.
